trans-unit.source: Indicates the type of input that the grammar, defined by the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref>, will match.
trans-unit.target: 문법에 정의 된 입력의 유형을 나타냅니다는 <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref>, 일치 하 게 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: The input mode for an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> is determined by its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 입력된 모드는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>따라 사용자가 해당 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A>속성.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: The default input mode is Voice, which indicates that the grammar defined by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> will match speech input.
trans-unit.target: 기본 입력된 모드는 음성 문법에서 정의 하는 나타내는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>음성 입력에 일치 합니다.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>

trans-unit.source: The Dtmf mode indicates that a grammar will match Dual-Tone Multi-Frequency (DTMF) tones instead of speech.
trans-unit.target: Dtmf 모드 문법 음성 대신 듀얼 톤 다중 주파수 (DTMF) 음 일치를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: There are 16 DTMF tones, 12 of which are commonly found on most telephones.
trans-unit.target: 대부분의 전화 번호에 12는 일반적으로 발견 되 16 DTMF 음 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object from an <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object will match the type of input specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> property, which gets an instance of SrgsGrammarMode.
trans-unit.target: 만들 때 한 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>에서 개체는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument>, <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>개체의 입력으로 지정 된 형식과 일치 합니다는 <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A>속성 SrgsGrammarMode의 인스턴스를 가져옵니다.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.Mode%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> object will match DTMF tones similar to those found on a telephone, instead of speech.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"> </xref> 개체 대신 음성 전화를 걸어 있는 것과 비슷한 DTMF 음을 일치 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument"></xref> object will match speech input.
